column5: Hit up the local fast water today, tossing cleos around 5:30 tonight. Nailed this beautiful gal on a rainbow 2/5 Oz. Cleo. She was my first bow ever and went back in the drink to make some babies   .  Someone should have told her I was using a WALLEYE rod...
Livin' on the Ste. Marie's river and you only just now scored your first bow?  Beautiful fish!  One more steelie than me this year.
They give the ol'  walleye rod a good fight dont' they? That's how I caught my first rainbow as well. Awsome fish!
Yah that walleye rod hasnt been buckled over that much since the last big Pike that hit it  I may need to buy a steelhead rod....  Anyone?
